name: The Incubator
description:
In the middle of nowhere galaxy there is The Incubator that is an object that absorbs skeletons and and creates souls .However in this Game the player should be able to collect skeletons inorder to earn souls taking in account to avoid the asteroids .

controls:

Up arrow

Down arrow

Right arrow

Left arrow

This my very first release of a game that was made during a ludumdare i hope you guys like it .Looking forward to get more ideas to add it to this prototype and i will be releasing the game on android phones.

Please support me on :

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/?action=p...
